Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class TurnListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.TurnListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class TurnListener extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
TurnListener is a PropertyChangeLister that listen the game controller to catch events that regard the end of a turn the end of a round phase. Also, th listener listen to events that are fired always at the beginning of round phase, these are the cloud refill and the assistants update at the beginning of a planning phase

  • Method Details

    • endTurnEventPerformed

      public void endTurnEventPerformed(String turnEnder, String turnStarter, TurnPhase[] possibleActions)
      Forwards an EndTurn message to the remote view in order to inform the client that a turn is ended, and it is the turn of the specified turn starter
      Parameters:
      turnEnder - the one who has ended the turn
      turnStarter - the one who will start the turn
      possibleActions - the actions that the one that will start the turn can do

    • endPhaseEventPerformed

      public void endPhaseEventPerformed(RoundPhase newPhase, String starter, TurnPhase[] possibleActions)
      Forwards a ChangePhase message that will inform clients that a new round phase is started and that the specified turn started will start the turn
      Parameters:
      newPhase - the new round phase
      starter - the starter of the phase
      possibleActions - the actions that the starter can do during the turn

    • sendAssistantUpdate

      public void sendAssistantUpdate(String nickname, Integer[] values, Integer[] motherNatureMovements)
      Forwards an AssistantsUpdate to the remote view that will contain all the assistants that the client can play
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the client, if it is the name associated to the remote view the message will be forwarded, otherwise no
      values - the assistants' ids that the client can play
      motherNatureMovements - the assistants mother nature movements, associated with the ids

    • sendCloudRefill

      public void sendCloudRefill(RealmType[][] cloudsStudents)
      Forwards a CloudsRefill to the remote view in order to inform the client of the students that are contained in the clouds after a refill at the beginning of a new planning phase
      Parameters:
      cloudsStudents - the students of each cloud, the element i contains students for the cloud i

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Responds to an event that come from the game controller
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
